title: Ep. 91 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Brendan Schaub
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://Squarespace.com for a free trial and when you’re ready to launch, use the offer code BEARS to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain - Go to https://Whoop.com and use code "Bears” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Head to https://PolicyGenius.com/cave to get started right now. Policygenius. When it comes to insurance, it’s nice to get it right. - Get 20% Off + Free Shipping at https://Manscaped.com/BEARS - Go to https://hellotushy.com/BEARS to get 10% off your order and FREE shipping - You can get all the different flavors of Bud Light Seltzer delivered at https://budlight.com/delivery or pick it up at your local neighborhood grocery, convenience or liquor store - Go to https://creditkarma.com/WINMONEY to sign up for free and start winning Instant Karma - Purchase at https://BlackRifleCoffee.com/BEARS and use code: BEARS at checkout for 20% off your purchase and your first coffee club order!

Today on 2 Bears 1 Cave, comedian and podcast host, Brendan Schaub stops by the studio. To kick things off, Brendan tells Tom about getting a black belt because of his son, celebrity fights and taking steroids. Next, Tom explains his strategies as a young comedian, the importance of set lengths and what to learn from other big comedians. After that, Tom tells Brendan about meeting Joe Rogan for the first time, getting dinner with Charlie Murphy and doing open mics at the Comedy Store. Then, Brendan and Tom talk about lying to their kids, paparazzi following Tom and the fascination of Jake and Logan Paul.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
